header_text: You and your friend took some pictures together. You look through your feed and see that they tagged you in a photo that you really don't like. You know that, in the long run, it won't matter.

elements.Text: Are you worried about your appearance in the posted picture?

elements.name: You and your friend took some pictures together. You look through your feed and see that they tagged you in a photo that you really don't like. You know that, in the long run, it won't matter._Social Situations_comp_question
elements.incorrect_feedback: Whoops! That doesn't look right. Please wait a moment and try again.
